00019 class PLBmp;
00020 
00021 class CDIBGrItem : public CGrItem
00022 {
00023 
00024 DECLARE_DYNAMIC (CDIBGrItem);
00025 
00026 public:
00027   CDIBGrItem
00028     ( int x,            // Position on the canvas
00029       int y,
00030       int w,            // Width
00031       int h,            // Height
00032       int z,            // Position in z-Order
00033       BYTE Opacity,     // Opacity of the object. 255 is completely
00034                         // opaque, 0 is completely transparent.
00035       PLBmp * pBmp      // The bitmap.
00036     );
00037 
00038   ~CDIBGrItem
00039     ();
00040 
00041   virtual void Draw
00042     ( PLBmp * pCanvas,
00043       CRect * pUpdateRect
00044     );
00045     // Responsible for drawing the object on the canvas.
00046 
00047   PLBmp * GetBmp
00048     ()
00049   {
00050     return m_pBmp;
00051   }
00052 
00053 private:
00054   void drawClippedNoScale
00055     ( PLBmp * pCanvas,
00056       CRect * pRect
00057     );
00058     // Draws the object. pRect must have been clipped already.
00059     // Assumes that no scaling is nessesary.
00060 
00061   void drawAlphaLine
00062     ( BYTE * pDest,
00063       BYTE * pSrc,
00064       CRect * pRect
00065     );
00066 
00067   void drawFadeLine
00068     ( BYTE * pDest,
00069       BYTE * pSrc,
00070       CRect * pRect
00071     );
00072 
00073   void drawClipped
00074     ( PLBmp * pCanvas,
00075       CRect * pRect
00076     );
00077 
00078   void drawClippedNoAlpha
00079     ( PLBmp * pCanvas,
00080       CRect * pRect
00081     );
00082 
00083   // Member variables.
